name: df-bl
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cbl, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpo(s1, s2, cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), cxr, crab(s3, cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), wbr(co(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s3)), clt, cv(s2))))))
bodyPretty: âŠ¢ ball =(s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦(s1 âˆˆ dom(dom(s0)), s2 âˆˆ â„* â†¦ { s3 âˆˆ dom(dom(s0))|(s1[s0]s3)[<]s2 }))
comment: Define the metric space ball function. See ~ blval for its value. (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-2006.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
